about.title: About Us
about.our_story_text: Founded in 2010, our restaurant has been dedicated to bringing exceptional dining experiences to our community. We believe in using only the freshest, locally-sourced ingredients to create dishes that delight and inspire.
about.chef_bio: Chef Maria Rodriguez brings over 20 years of culinary expertise to our kitchen. Trained in classical French technique with a passion for local ingredients, she creates dishes that honor tradition while embracing innovation.
